comment.author: 42264328@N00
comment._content: Several of these (though not this one, I guess!) are captioned "3/3/13" corresponding to the Suffrage Parade in Washington, D.C., 3 March 1913, see, for instance, Library of Congress.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Cotinis: It looks like you are probably correct and this is another photo of the March 3, 1913 suffrage march in Washington, D.C. We will update the source data and reload the description.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Actually, the 3/3/13 date does appear on this negative, but it is scratched on at the top, where it is obscured by tree limbs and twigs. (Better viewed in the enlarged version.) History of the Woman Suffrage Procession: www.loc.gov/loc/lcib/9803/suffrage.html
